biotools.summary: PEP-FOLD uses a hidden Markov model-derived structural alphabet for de novo modeling of 3D conformations of peptides between 9-25 amino acids in aqueous solution. Updates to PEP-FOLD allow for modeling of linear and disulphide bonded cyclic peptides with 9-36 amino acids using benchmarked peptides.
